0.text: Bug 122577  Library Explorer does not refresh after creating or changing a library.

4.text: Expected: The library appears in Library Explorer.

5.text: Actual: The library does not appear in Library Explorer until you re-open Eclipse.

10.text: For example, change the title, or add a report item.

12.text: Expected: The library changes appear in Library Explorer.

13.text: Actual: The library changes do not appear in Library Explorer until you re-open Eclipse.
